hybrides

Class TrieHybride

  • java.lang.Object
    • hybrides.TrieHybride

  • public class TrieHybride
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a Ternary tree. It uses the class hybrides.Node to represent a node in the tree.
    See Also:
    Node

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrieHybride

        public TrieHybride()
        Default constructor of the TrieHybride. Sets the root to null

      • TrieHybride

        public TrieHybride(java.lang.String[] mots)
        Creates a TrieHybride. The resultant TrieHybride(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>) will contain the words array parameter words has. This method calls the insertion(String, int) method for each word in the array words.
        Parameters:
        mots - - the array of words to be inserted

      • TrieHybride

        public TrieHybride(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> mots)
        Creates a TrieHybride. The resultant TrieHybride(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>) will contain the words the ArrayList parameter words. This method calls the insertion(String, int) method for each word in the array words.
        Parameters:
        mots - - the arraylist of words to be inserted
        See Also:
        insertion(String, int)

        Parameters:
        word - - the word to be added
        value - - the value of the word i.e the value of the last node

        Parameters:

        Returns:
